title.rendered: UGREEN Micro USB Fast Charger Cable USB to Micro B Data Lead Compatible with Samsung A10 S7 S6 Edge J7 J6 J5 J4 Plus J3…

content.rendered:
Unrivalled Durability and Distinctive Appearance

The mixture of prolonged SR Protection and Aluminum Connector Casing makes this PS4 Charging Cable not solely seems to be distinctive but additionally rather more sturdy than different typical cables.

Read more

Speedy Sync & Fast Charge Cable

This Micro USB Data Cable helps QC 3.0 / 2.0 and Huawei FCP fast cost protocols, permitting you to cost most appropriate units at their full pace with 18w most output. Up to 480Mbps Data sync pace permits you to switch 1GB information in a short while.

Universal Compatibility

Samsung: Samsung Galaxy A10/S7 Edge/S7/S6 Edge Plus/S6 Edge/S6/J8/J7 Prime/J7 2016/J6/J6+/J5/J5 Prime/J4 Plus/J3 Prime/J3 2017/Note 5/Note 4/A5 (2016)/Tab A 8.0/Tab E 9.6, and so on;

Huawei: Huawei Mediapad M3/MediaPad T3/Y9/Y7/Y6 2019/Nova 3i/P Smart/P Smart 2019/P10 lite/P9 lite/P8 lite/P8/Honor 9 Lite/Honor 8X;

Motorola: Moto G6 Play/G5/G4/G4 Plus/G4 play/E 2020/E6/E6 Plus/E5 Plus/E4/E3;

LG: LG K10 2017/K8 2017/K7/G4/Q6 and so on;

Sony: Sony Xperia Z5/Z5 Premium/Z3/Z3 Compact/Z2/XA and so on;

Xiaomi: Xiaomi Mi A2 Lite/Redmi 6A/Redmi 5/Redmi Note 5 Pro and so on;

Nokia: Nokia 2.3/1.3/4.2/2.2/6/5/3/3.1/8110 4G/3310/105/Lumia 635/Lumia 925 and so on;

Alcatel: U5, U3, 1c, 1v, 1, and so on; Ulefone: Note 8, Note 7, and so on;

HTC: HTC Desire 530/Desire 626;

Vodafone: Vodafone Smart N8/N9 lite/N9;

BlackBerry: BlackBerry priv/Z10/Z30 and so on;

ZTE: ZTE Blade V7/V8 and so on;

Others: PS4 Controllers, SJCAM SJ4000/SJ5000/M10 WIFI digicam, Dji Spark / Mavic Remote Controller, Asus T100, Memo Pad, Transformer, Asus Google Nexus 7,Acer Iconia Tab,and so on.

In a phrase, this Micro USB 2.0 cable appropriate with all Micro USB 2.0 units.

18W USB Wall Charger Plug 18W PD USB C Charger Plug Car Fast Charger Adapter 36W USB Car Fast Charger 60W USB C to USB C Cable 100W USB C to USB C Cable
Charger Speed 18W 18W 18W 36W 60W 100W
Connector USB A USB C USB C & USB A USB A USB C to USB C USB C to USB C

18W Fast Charge & Speedy Syncing: UGREEN Micro USB to USB Cable helps each Quick Charge 2.0/3.0 and Huawei PCF Fast Charge expertise and delivers present up to 2.4A and helps 18W max energy output(12V/1.5A, 9V/2A, 5V/2.4A), which permits to cost most units at their full pace. For instance, absolutely cost Samsung Galaxy S7 in 1.5h. Simultaneously helps high-speed information transmission fee up to 480Mbps, transferring 1GB information in minutes. An ideal time-saver for you.
Bendable Connection & Fit Snugly: UGREEN USB to Micro USB Charger Cable incorporates a bolstered bendable plug and wire connection design, making the cable anti-stretch and anti-folding in addition to robust sufficient to stand up to abuse therapy like arduous pull, which permits you to transfer round freely. No want to fear about bending the cable to make the wire crack or the charging stopped. This versatile design additionally helps preserve a good match on each ends and ensures steady charging and information sync.
Build to Last: The mixture of high-quality supplies and versatile development design endues extra sturdiness to UGREEN Micro USB Fast Charger Lead. Passing 10,000+ bend checks, the outside double-layer nylon braid jacket supplies unrivalled safety to the interior wires. The premium aluminium connectors are anti-corrosion,anti-oxidation and anti overheat. Moreover, the versatile bendable joint design provides extra sturdiness and longer lifespan to the charging cable.
Intelligent chip & Multi Shielding: The Micro USB 2.0 Quick Charge Cable options upgraded clever chip that can modify the present to be adaptive to your units, which is sweet to forestall over-current situation and shield your units’s battery successfully. The mixture of aluminum foil,tinned copper core,TPE jacket,nylon braid sheilding supplies superior USB2.0 cable efficiency, error-free information transmission and quick charging pace.
Universal Fit: The Micro USB Charger Data Lead is constructed with customary plugs and matches snugly to all Android Micro USB B units, like Samsung Galaxy S7/S6 Edge/J8/J7 Pro/J6/J5/J4 Plus/J3/Tab A,Huawei P10 Lite/P9 Lite/P8/P8 Lite/P sensible/P Smart 2019/Y9//Y7/Y6,Nokia 1.3/2.2/2.36/5/3/3310/8110 4G,Xiaomi Mi A2 Lite,Sony Xperia XA/Z5/Z3,LG Q6/K8/K7,Moto G6 Play/E6/E6 Plus/E5/E5 Plus/G5/E4, Ulefone Note 7/Note 8, Alcatel U5/1c/1v, HTC Desire 626,Vodafone,TV Stick, PS4 controller,digicam.

excerpt.rendered:
18W Fast Charge & Speedy Syncing: UGREEN Micro USB to USB Cable supports both Quick Charge 2.0/3.0 and Huawei PCF Fast Charge technology and delivers current up to 2.4A and supports 18W max power output(12V/1.5A, 9V/2A, 5V/2.4A), which enables to charge most devices at their full speed. For example, fully charge Samsung Galaxy S7 in 1.5h. Simultaneously supports high-speed data transmission rate up to 480Mbps, transferring 1GB files in minutes. A perfect time-saver for you.
Bendable Connection & Fit Snugly: UGREEN USB to Micro USB Charger Cable features a reinforced bendable plug and wire connection design, making the cable anti-stretch and anti-folding as well as strong enough to withstand abuse treatment like hard pull, which allows you to move around freely. No need to worry about bending the cable to make the wire crack or the charging stopped. This flexible design also helps maintain a tight fit on both ends and ensures stable charging and data sync.
Build to Last: The combination of high-quality materials and flexible construction design endues more durability to UGREEN Micro USB Fast Charger Lead. Passing 10,000+ bend tests, the exterior double-layer nylon braid jacket provides unrivalled protection to the inner wires. The premium aluminium connectors are anti-corrosion,anti-oxidation and anti overheat. Moreover, the flexible bendable joint design adds more durability and longer lifespan to the charging cable.
